name: Macbook Pro
description: A brand new state of the art Macbook pro. This computer is great for students, hobbyists and professionals alike.

name: Bluetooth Mouse
description: Control your computer from afar with this wireless bluetooth mouse. At a price this low it's a steal!

name: Xbox One
description: Get the latest and greatest in gaming consoles. This Xbox One bundles comes with two wireless controllers, two free games and a free month of XBOX Live. The only thing it doesn't come with is all the games on the PS4.
